Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Westbound Reroute near Belmont/Kenmore
ShortDescription: Update: WB 77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Sheffield, Wellington, Racine and Belmont due to, street blockage near Belmont/Kenmore.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Sheffield, Wellington, Racine and Belmont due to, street blockage near Belmont/Kenmore.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #87 87th Temporary Reroute at Cottage Grove/87th
ShortDescription: 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via: 87th, Martin Luther King Dr., 83rd, Stony Island, and 87th, due to, street blockage, near Cottage Grove/87th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via: 87th, Martin Luther King Dr., 83rd, Stony Island, and 87th, due to, street blockage, near Cottage Grove/87th.

Allow extra travel time.
